Category.name: FriendlyFatality
Category.Bark: Oops, I did it again! I played with your heart! Got lost in the game...
Probably won't get Christmas cards from him anymore...

Category.name: EnemyFatality
Category.Bark: Don't act like you're not impressed.

Category.name: NeutralFatality
Category.Bark: Every man dies...not every man truly lives.
Hey, did anyone else see that!?

Category.name: PreFriendlyFatality
Category.Bark: I feel like something bad is about to happen...

Category.name: PreEnemyFatality
Category.Bark: I know what you're thinking - but you gotta ask yourself: "Do I feel lucky?"

Category.name: PreNeutralFatality
Category.Bark: I sure could go for a Twinky right now...
